parsed.recap:
DEV: Lisle village obliterated—Rance's latent Mage-Gift awakened during bandit attack, unleashing catastrophic magical fury; Senta Chose Rance during crisis, stabilizing burned-open channels. Attackers identified as Karsite special forces disguised as bandits; red Sun-Priest robes recovered from bodies; took live captives for blood magic/human sacrifice. Four-day ride to Haven; Healers stabilized Rance. Addressed Queen's Circle—revealed complete mind-merge with Talia during Mind-Healing memory recovery; now shares all memories, state secrets, training, protocol knowledge. Circle sealed information; arranged Healer's cottage in Companion's Field for isolation/safety. Herald Myste dispatched to archives for Mage-Gift training records (first Mage-Gift since Vanyel, centuries ago). Kyril tasked with contacting Rethwellan/Hardorn/Menmellith regarding Karsite activity. Official cover: ordinary Herald-trainee.

PEND: Talia's recovery and implications of two people possessing Queen's Own knowledge/capabilities. Training regimen for unprecedented Mage-Gift without living teachers. Karsite blood magic campaign scope—Valdemar-specific or broader threat? Fate of captured villagers unresolved. Contingency if Rance loses control. Circle's private deliberations on security/political ramifications.

entities.c: Village obliterated by Rance's Gift-awakening; Karsite special forces took captives before blast
